original_text: Jesus is the kind of special priest that we need. He completely belongs to God. He has never done anything wrong. He is completely good and clean. He is separate from everyone who does wrong things. God has raised him up to the most important place in heaven.
korean_text: 이러한 대제사장은 우리에게 합당하니 거룩하고 악이 없고 더러움이 없고 죄인에게서 떠나 계시고 하늘보다 높이 되신 이라

sentences.original_text: Jesus is the kind of special priest
sentences.korean_translation: 예수님은 우리가 필요로 하는 특별한 제사장의 종류입니다

sentences.original_text: He has never done anything wrong
sentences.korean_translation: 그분은 결코 잘못된 일을 한 적이 없습니다

sentences.original_text: He is completely good and clean
to the most important place in heaven
